ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC
In the violent climax of Hit-Girl’s Canadian adventure, Mindy’s been arrested and packed off to Kashechewan. Can she bust out and finish what she started with Baker, killing his drug trade to New York? This axe-fighting, wood-chipping Canadian finale features corrupt Mounties and pretty-boy politicians.
